divs: Sighting DetailsI was awakened & knew to go to my back picture window. (I was awakened by a voice asking me to come o the window.) There was a stationary vortex looking glowing white mist light in my backyard. I went to the back door, opened it & continued to look at it. I felt peaceful and calm. I thought it was a spirit, as I had been experiencing spirit visits 4 days in a row prior to this event. (I had been hellping spirits cross over.) It extended approx. 8-10 feet from ground to top, though it didn't touch the ground; it appeared to float. I said my St. Michael prayer & watched it. It slowly faded away like a fog leaving after it rolls in. It then was gone. My chocolate lab was barking. This had happened 2 days prior also. The next day I went out to look and there were no marks on my grass--as if nothing was there. About a week later my dad said, "Deborah, I saw something last night in the yard." He told me he saw a white light as a mist in the same spot I saw the light. I told him what it looked like at the same time he was telling me. He said, "Wait, you saw it?" I said, "I've seen it twice a week ago."
Summary: Awoke to see round misty light just off ground, disappeared after 5-10 min.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in North East
There were no other sightings in North East on or around August 7th 2009
